hadiths.text: Ibn Abbas (Allah be pleased with them) reported:It was proposed that he (the Holy Prophet) be married to the daughter of Hamza, whereupon he said: She is not lawful for me for she is the daughter of my foster-brother, and that is unlawful by reason of fosterage what is unlawful by reason of genealogy

chapter.ara-name: باب تَحْرِيمِ ابْنَةِ الأَخِ مِنَ الرَّضَاعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The daughter of one's brother through breastfeeding is forbidden in marriage
